name: Bazaar - Jeju DeFi + NFT Marketplace
description: Unified token launchpad, Uniswap V4 swaps, liquidity pools, and NFT marketplace. Create tokens, trade assets, provide liquidity, and discover game NFTs.

skills.name: List Tokens
skills.description: Get list of ERC20 tokens deployed on Jeju

skills.name: Get Token Details
skills.description: Get detailed information about a specific token including holders, transfers

skills.name: Create Token
skills.description: Deploy a new ERC20 token to Jeju network

skills.name: Swap Tokens
skills.description: Execute token swap via Uniswap V4

skills.name: Create Liquidity Pool
skills.description: Create a new Uniswap V4 liquidity pool

skills.name: Add Liquidity
skills.description: Add liquidity to an existing Uniswap V4 pool

skills.name: Remove Liquidity
skills.description: Remove liquidity from a Uniswap V4 pool

skills.name: Get Pool Information
skills.description: Get details about a liquidity pool including TVL, volume, APR

skills.name: List NFTs
skills.description: Browse NFTs available on the marketplace

skills.name: Get NFT Details
skills.description: Get detailed information about a specific NFT

skills.name: List NFT for Sale
skills.description: Create a listing to sell an NFT on the marketplace

skills.name: Buy NFT
skills.description: Purchase an NFT from the marketplace

skills.name: Get My NFTs
skills.description: List NFTs owned by a specific address

skills.name: List Registered Games
skills.description: Get list of games registered in ERC-8004 registry

skills.name: Get Latest Blocks
skills.description: Get recent blocks from Jeju blockchain
